meanings: (눈에 들어오다) be seen, come in sight, (나타나다) appear
(보여 주다) show (sth to sb / sb sth), display, demonstrate, let sb see, (formal) exhibit

vlive.korean: 보인다. I can see it. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SKZ in 광주♡♡♡
나 오늘 진짜 피곤해 보인다 어떡해? I look really tired today. What should I do? 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅁㅁㄹ🧸
vlive.english: I look really tired today. What should I do?

vlive.korean: 이제 잘 보인다 어떻게 하지? Now you can see me clearly. What should I do with this? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 즐거운 휴닝로직🤗
vlive.english: Now you can see me clearly. What should I do with this?

vlive.korean: 이러면 다 보인다 그렇지? You can see it all like this, right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: You can see it all like this, right?

vlive.korean: 아 머리를 잘랐더니 똘똘해 보인다! Wow, I had a haircut and fans say I look smart! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [UP10TION] 방정리가 왜 필요하죠? 맑고 깨끗한 옝이가 있는데💛 (SUNYOUL showing his room)
vlive.english: Wow, I had a haircut and fans say I look smart!
